label: XLED Home 2
description: PIR sensor with relay and light

paramInformation.label: Light Threshold
paramInformation.description: Allowable Range: 2-2000. Moving the potentiometer overwrites the current setting.

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor Sensitivity
paramInformation.description: Moving the potentiometer overwrites the current setting.

paramInformation.label: Brightness Measuring Interval
paramInformation.description: Lamp switches off shortly and measures the ambient light.

paramInformation.label: External Ambient Light Sensor
paramInformation.description: Measurements from associated Z-Wave light sensors are preferred if not older than 30 minutes.

paramInformation.label: External Control
paramInformation.description: When enabled, the lamp is controlled externally via Z-Wave and internal sensors are not used.

paramInformation.label: Gateway Check
paramInformation.description: External Control disabled: Lamp signalizes failure to reach the gateway. External Control enabled: Lamp falls back to normal mode after gateway could not be reached repeatedly.

paramInformation.label: Permanently On
paramInformation.description: When enabled, overrides the External Control and Gateway Check parameters

paramInformation.label: Z-Wave Off Command: Turn Off Duration
paramInformation.description: On motion detection, light turns off for the configured duration: 1...100 = seconds, 101...200 = minutes (minus 100), 201...209 = hours (minus 200)

options.label: Turn off immediately, until motion detected
Turn off immediately for duration of param 1 (Light Duration After Motion) or until motion detected

paramInformation.label: Z-Wave On Command: Turn On Duration
paramInformation.description: Light turns on for the configured duration, then waits for motion to return to normal operation: 1...100 = seconds, 101...200 = minutes (minus 100), 201...209 = hours (minus 200)

options.label: Turn on, wait for motion immediately
Turn on immediately for duration of param 1 (Light Duration After Motion) or until motion detected

paramInformation.label: Z-Wave On / Off-On: Motion Wait Time Limit
paramInformation.description: How long to wait for motion after the configured duration before returning to normal operation to prevent staying on forever: 1...100 = seconds, 101...200 = minutes (minus 100), 201...209 = hours (minus 200)

paramInformation.label: Z-Wave On-Off Sequence: Turn Off Duration
paramInformation.description: On motion detection, light turns off for the configured duration: 1...100 = seconds, 101...200 = minutes (minus 100), 201...209 = hours (minus 200)

options.label: Ignore sequence, treat like off command

paramInformation.label: Z-Wave Off-On Sequence: Turn On Duration
paramInformation.description: Light turns on for the configured duration, then waits for motion to return to normal operation: 1...100 = seconds, 101...200 = minutes (minus 100), 201...209 = hours (minus 200)

options.label: Turn on, wait for motion immediately
Ignore sequence, treat like on command

paramInformation.label: Sequence Timing
paramInformation.description: Maximum delay between on-off or off-on commands to treat as a sequence

paramInformation.label: Motion Sensor Disable Timeout
paramInformation.description: How long to disable internal motion sensor after Basic Set command to motion endpoint: 1...100 = seconds, 101...200 = minutes (minus 100), 201...209 = hours (minus 200)
